Oshliath and Osileth

  • Card Variation:

    Character

  • Movement Range:

    1

  • Genetic Disposition:

    Astral

  • Attack Points:
    Osileth's Scale:
    mineral - exo
    Osileth's Underbelly:
    organic - endo
    Oshliath's flame:
    energy - mortal
  • Injury Tolerance:

    2

  • Play Style:

    Rolls with a D20 and a D6, must retreat if osileth takes damage.

  • Brawl Power:

    KVph

  • Habitat:

    Mountain Range

  • History:

    Oshliath and osileth come from a brude of dragons designed genetically to emulate the european dragons from ancient mythology. Oshliath and her mate were one of four pairs created to test the feasibility of the european dragon's body type and survival instinct. While intelligent, none were intended to be sentient. Oshliath was released into the wild where her behaviors were closely observed. She tends to act reclusive, so it came as a shock to her research team when they found the young dragon pup, deemed osileth, forgeging along side oshliath. The team believes that the osileth will remain by his mother until his soft under belly toughens with maturity.

  • Scarcity:
    Founder's Deck
